query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS agent_performance (
  id VARCHAR(128) PRIMARY KEY,
  agentId INT NOT NULL,
  agentName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  
  -- Performance metrics
  totalRequests INT DEFAULT 0,
  successfulRequests INT DEFAULT 0,
  failedRequests INT DEFAULT 0,
  successRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  
  -- Response time metrics (in milliseconds)
  avgResponseTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  minResponseTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  maxResponseTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  
  -- Specialization effectiveness
  primaryCapability VARCHAR(255),
  capabilitySuccessRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  
  -- Collaboration metrics
  collaborationCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  mostFrequentPartner INT,
  
  -- Utilization metrics
  currentLoad INT DEFAULT 0,
  peakLoad INT DEFAULT 0,
  utilizationRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  
  -- Quality metrics
  avgUserRating DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  totalRatings INT DEFAULT 0,
  
  -- Timestamps
  lastActive TIMESTAMP,
  lastUpdated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  
  INDEX idx_agent (agentId),
  INDEX idx_success_rate (successRate DESC),
  INDEX idx_response_time (avgResponseTime),
  INDEX idx_utilization (utilizationRate DESC)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
